statements: DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 100 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'Failed' AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_id = 100 AND api_version = 'v1';
DELETE FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type = 'credit' AND integration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'failed';
DELETE FROM payment_logs WHERE log_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND log_message LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe' OR email = 'john.doe@example.com';
